item.description:
This is a very scenic park with wide flat trails. We will walk for about an hour and fifteen minutes, to an hour and a half.

This meetup will only take place if we get 5 people or more, RSVP will close the day before so check back to see if it is a go.
item.how_to_find_us: We will be in the parking lot at the main entrance, There is an info center with washrooms.

group.name: The South Shore Dog Lovers Pack Walk

item.name: Sunday at Borderland State Park
